name: Super Japanese Crossword
description:
Japanese crossword or nonogramma — a puzzle game with simple rules and difficult decisions. Unlike regular crosswords, there are encrypted not words but images. Soothing colors of the game will allow you to relax after a hard day, and logic puzzles will help to spend your free time usefully.

Features:
-Free
-3D
-Pinch Zoom on the Mobile Devices
-Perspective view
-30 levels
-iPad Pro Support

And more!

Programmers:
Nikolay Smorgun
Nikolay Sinitsin

Sound Engineer:
Anastasia Levchenko

Design:
Taisiya Yaroshenko
